properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Furaha mateso yetu,
Bwana tunakutolea
mikononi mwako
pokea sadaka ewe Bwana
wetu tunayokutolea leo.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pokea Bwana. x2
Ee Bwana Pokea. x2
Pokea Bwana ewe Bwana
wetu tunayokutolea leo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mazao ya kazi zetu zote,
tunakutolea Baba Mungu wetu,
Pokea sadaka ewe Bwana
wetu tunayokutolea leo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Pokea mkate na divai,
ndiyo alama ya agano jipya,
pokea sadaka ewe Bwana
wetu tunayokutolea leo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hivi ndio mwili
na damu ya Kristu,
Ndiyo imani ya wakristu,
pokea sadaka ewe Bwana
wetu tunayokutolea leo.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Atukuzwe Baba
na mwana na Roho,
Mwanzo leo kisha milele,
pokea sadaka ewe Bwana
wetu tunayokutolea leo.
